description.narrative: (i) Contribute to improved healthcare standards for quality, efficiency and ethical practices in acquired regional units. (ii) Expand access of middle and/or low-income patients to modern diagnostic services. (iii) South - South Investment, a priority for IFC since such investments are thought to promoteÂ increased regional integration and creation of regional champions. (iv) Direct job creation: The Company will create approximately 800 new jobs by 2018, of which 40% are medical personnel (nurses and medical technicians) and approxmately 65% are female.

The Company is undertaking $17 million investment program to: i) execute acquisition of labs across Southern Russia and Ukraine; and ii) finance organic growth of new collection centers as part of its blueprint growth framework in order to increase test volumes and improve the overall quality provision across its operating subsidiaries.

name.narrative: The Project is to be mainly invested in the three regions of Russian Federation (Volga, Urals and Siberia), as well as Ukraine. Investments will mainly comprise acquisition finance, as well as funding of operational companies organic growth in all four countries of operation.
